data.eml:eml: New species of Euschistus (Euschistus) from Jamaica, Euschistus (Mitripus) and Ladeaschistus from southern South America (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cioato, Alana, Bianchi, Filipe Michels, Eger, Joseph, Grazia, Jocelia (2015): New species of Euschistus (Euschistus) from Jamaica, Euschistus (Mitripus) and Ladeaschistus from southern South America (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae). Zootaxa 4048 (4): 565-574, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4048.4.7
